content.en: AI-driven Innovation: Artificial intelligence (AI) technology is driving innovation in business models, acting as a catalyst for change. Researchers are exploring the building blocks and typology of AI, as well as its effects on organizational competencies. They are also investigating how Innovation and Technology Management can adopt and categorize AI for business, and the current business value and contribution of AI in information systems research. Additionally, they are examining the challenges, opportunities, and research agenda for AI in various domains, and the competencies and roles of top management in AI-enabled business model innovation. Overall, the research aims to understand how organizations can leverage AI technologies to gain business value and drive innovation.
content.da: AI-drevet Innovation: Kunstig intelligens (AI) teknologi driver innovation inden for forretningsmodeller og fungerer som en katalysator for forandring. Forskere udforsker byggestenene og typologien af AI, samt dets indvirkninger på organisatoriske kompetencer. De undersøger også, hvordan innovation og teknologiledelse kan adoptere og kategorisere AI til forretning, samt den nuværende forretningsværdi og bidrag af AI i informationssystemforskningsfeltet. Ydermere analyserer de udfordringerne, mulighederne og forskningsagendaen for AI i forskellige områder og de kompetencer og roller, topledelsen har i AI-aktiveret forretningsmodelinnovation. Overordnet sigter forskningen mod at forstå, hvordan organisationer kan udnytte AI-teknologier til at opnå forretningsværdi og fremme innovation.
